item.title: Data Driven Journalism Books
item.description: Books about data journalism in association with Amazon.com.

item.title: Creative Coding Books
item.description: Books about programmatic creation of data visualizations with D3, Python, Processing and SVG in association with Amazon.com.

item.title: Data Mining and Analysis Books
item.description: Books about mining and analyzing data using statistics and programming tools in association with Amazon.com.

item.title: Maps and Cartography Books
item.description: Books about maps and cartography in association with Amazon.com.

item.title: Data Visualization Books
item.description: Books about data visualization in general, covering theory and practice of creating data visualizations in association with Amazon.com.

item.title: Berlin Bike Routes Map
item.description: A map of Berlin, Germany showing 14 different biking routes through and around the city. Created with OpenLayers, Open Street Map and data from Senatsverwaltung für Stadtentwicklung und Umwelt.

item.title: What Others Say
item.description: A selection of Tweets from people referring to Exploring Data on Twitter ordered by date of publication.

item.title: Search for Public Data on the Web
item.description: A Google custom search engine, that searches sites that host public data.

item.title: Ballon d'Or 2012 Votes Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the connections between voters and voted players from the male FIFA Ballon d'Or vote 2012.

item.title: Evolution of Internet Users from 1990 - 2011
item.description: An animated evolution of Internet users across the worlds countries created with the D3 JavaScript library.
